title: A Day-to-Day Dynamical Approach to the Most Likely User Equilibrium Problem. (arXiv:2401.08013v1 [cs.GT])
abstract: The lack of a unique user equilibrium (UE) route flow in traffic assignment has posed a significant challenge to many transportation applications. The maximum-entropy principle, which advocates for the consistent selection of the most likely solution as a representative, is often used to address the challenge. Built on a recently proposed day-to-day (DTD) discrete-time dynamical model called cumulative logit (CULO), this study provides a new behavioral underpinning for the maximum-entropy UE (MEUE) route flow. It has been proven that CULO can reach a UE state without presuming travelers are perfectly rational. translated_title: 一种日常动态方法解决最可能用户均衡问题
translated_abstract: 在交通分配中，缺乏唯一的用户均衡（UE）路径流给许多交通应用带来了重大挑战。最大熵原理通常用于解决这个挑战，它主张选择最有可能的解作为代表。基于最近提出的一种称为累积logit（CULO）的日常动态离散时间模型，本研究为最大熵UE（MEUE）路径流提供了一个新的行为支撑。已经证明CULO可以在假设旅行者不是完全理性的情况下达到UE状态。在这里，我们进一步证明了如果（i）旅行者对路径没有任何先验信息，因此被迫给予所有路径相等的选择概率，或者（ii）所有旅行者从同一信息源获取信息以满足所谓的一般比例条件，那么CULO始终会收敛到MEUE路径流。因此，CULO可以作为一个实际的解决方案。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种日常动态方法，基于最大熵原理解决了交通分配中缺乏唯一用户均衡路径流的问题。
en_tdlr: This study proposes a day-to-day dynamical approach that utilizes the maximum-entropy principle to address the lack of a unique user equilibrium route flow in traffic assignment.
